root: ^You find yourself on the gallows, a hempen noose about your neck. The Priest addresses the crowd.
^"This woman is accused of Witchcraft! She has stolen all the young women of the village! For this she must hang by the neck until dead!

paragraph_1: ^"Silence, witch!" Bellows the Priest. "We will hear nothing from you!"
^"Is this what we have come to?" you ask "Execution without a trial?"
paragraph_1_1: ^You search the crowd for friendly faces.
paragraph_2_1: ^"You are not judge, jury, or executioner!" You proclaim, "What ever happened to the democratic process?"
^The crowd appears to be confused, you are not helping your case.
paragraph_3_1: ^You see no hope. You attempt to escape, in the process you trigger the hangman's switch, opening the trapdoor beneath you.
^You didn't think it would be that easy did you?
paragraph_1_2: ^You catch the Blacksmith's eye. "You sir! Please help me!"

c: ^ "Have I not been a great friend to your daughter?"
^ "Have I not been a loyal customer?"

b: ^"She's right!" He proclaims. "And must be allowed defend herself!" The crowd cheers for your release.
^ "You'll get no help from me, witch!" Looks like you need to find help elsewhere.

paragraph_2_2: ^You catch the Goodwife's eye. "You ma'am! Please help me!"

c: ^ "Did I not bring you cake and wine when you were ill?"

b: ^"She's right!" She proclaims. "And must be allowed to defend herself!" The crowd cheers for your release.
^ "You'll get no help from me, witch!" Looks like you need to find help elsewhere.

paragraph_3_2: ^You catch the Shopkeep's eye. "You sir! Please help me!"

c: ^ "Have I ever brought your family any harm?"
^ "Have I not helped you at your Shop?"

b: ^"She's right!" He proclaims. "And must be allowed to defend herself!" The crowd cheers for your release.
^ "You'll get no help from me, witch!" Looks like you need to find help elsewhere.

priest_1: ^You fix the Priest with a steely gaze. After an eternity, he averts his eyes.
^"Very well." He says acidly. "She shall have 2 days to clear her name."
^He cuts your bonds and removes the noose. You are free.

priest_2: ^"Free me Preist!" You shout. "The people have spoken! I am not a witch!"
^The crowd murmers uneasily. The Priest smiles wickedly but cuts you loose.
